content:
```xml
<repairs>
    DEL_EDGE | [rm] | -
</repairs>
```

This repair operation removes the relationship `TAKES_MEDICATION` between the patient Cassandra224 and the medication Tenoretic 50 Oral Tablet, as it contains an ingredient (chlorthalidone) to which Cassandra224 is allergic. This ensures that Cassandra224 does not take a medication containing an allergen.
